title: Pie maker chocolate molten puddings
directions: Place the chocolate and butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 2-3 minutes or until melted and combined. Remove from heat.
Add the sugar, four and eggs to the chocolate mixture and quickly whisk to combine.

Preheat a pie maker. Pour about 1/3 cupfuls of the chocolate mixture into each pie maker hole. Cover and cook for 3-4 minutes or until a crust forms on the top of the puddings. Dust with cocoa powder. Serve with ice-cream and raspberries.
